mapper.select: select no, chatroom_id, (select member_id from chat_member where chatroom_id = cl.chatroom_id and member_id != 'admin') member_id, msg, time, type, ( select count(*) unread_count from chat_log where chatroom_id = cl.chatroom_id and time > (select last_check from chat_member where chatroom_id = cl.chatroom_id and member_id = 'admin') ) unread_count from ( select cl.*, row_number() over(partition by chatroom_id order by no desc) rnum from chat_log cl ) cl where rnum = 1
